title: @Riot Taric's W + R question

embed.description: Taric boasts a whole box of tools around neutral objectives thanks to his inherent tankiness and powerful teamfighting abilities. He can fend off enemy teams around dragon, for example, absorbing enemy poke with well-timed Bastion shields and his burgeoning health pool.

body:
I was looking at the released kit and had a question about the interaction of the two below abilities.

http://i.imgur.com/YhIonMl.png
http://i.imgur.com/NfmKBi4.png

Since W states that "All" abilities are simultaneously cast on Taric and his linked ally, does this mean two invuln areas are created? Or are Ultimates separated from abilities?

If you could clarify this for us we would appreciate it. Thank you!

replies.body: Yes, he R will cast on himself and any ally he has his W on

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Oh7aw6Bd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-05T19:45:15.620+0000)
>
> Yes, he R will cast on himself and any ally he has his W on

How does aiming dazzle through Bastion work? Is it like Glitterlance where both lines will converge towards the cursor or will it parallel the vector from Taric?
It works like Glitterlance!
Does that mean damage will only apply once, or will it be like Zed's Shuriken and damage stacks?

Why do this to Taric?  Why not just release a new champ?

If I wanted Glitterlance I would play Lulu.
If I wanted invulnerability I'd play Kayle.
If I wanted to link with another champion I'd play Kalista.

Taric's signature was AoE armor.  You ripped it off him, now he is someone totally different.  He may be a viable champion, but he is not Taric.

"If I wanted to link another champion I'd play Kalista."
wow that was a fucking reach though
"Taric's signature was AoE armor."
i'm sorry not everyone is as enthralled by the idea of passively giving everyone in an unknowable area invisible numbers as you are

Since we have you here. Will his ult be a stasis (Bard) or just an invulnerabilty (Kayle) ?

I mean, the wording seems clear in the description... It just sounds really really strong.
It works like Kayle Ult
But you are immune to CCs too am I right?
Nope, you can be CC'd while the ult is active, just can't take damage.
Ok thanks. Need to see how this works out because I'm aware that any buff to such skill can make it insanely OP.
Do the heals stack?
They do not. Its more about covering 2 areas, (back line and front line) rather then getting stacking effects.

I see. So there's a bit of give or take here, from a balance and design standpoint. Like, if the heals stacked, I'm assuming the areas of effect would have to be smaller, right? And the ratios smaller, etc.

I suddenly understand what repertoir was talking about when he said taric has the most potentially powerful spell in the game.

this is so rad
I really cant wait to start denying all those burst kills like you can on tahm
It'll be a little more difficult tho, since his R takes a couple seconds to kick in. I really wanna get my hands on this, I wish i had a pbe account
If you think you won't make it, you can buy yourself the time with {{item:3190}}
I didn't see the couple seconds part. Still, if you can use your heal and stun to keep them from instantly dieing it will be pretty awesome
Thank you for clarifying this for us Reav3. Can't wait for the highlight moments of this interaction :3
Will the ally also get the bonus armor? I guess so, but the wording isn't clear (to me it's not really clear what "bastion" is itself, if it also means the W passive)
Bastion on the PBE doesn't state that it is champion only, does that mean he can cast it on a minion for adouble Dazzle when he is alone?
Nope.
've gotta ask, any inspiration taken from Smite's Aphrodite? because his kit looks very very similar to hers.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Oh7aw6Bd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-05T19:45:15.620+0000)
>
> Yes, he R will cast on himself and any ally he has his W on

That's so good lol.
Good question. Mine is about the direction of his E + W. Can he change direction his ally  shoots the stun by changing his own stun?
I suspect it will be similar to how Lulu's E + Q work. The skill shots will travel in the direction of where the cursor was located at the time of activation.
I guess it works like Lulu's Q where both beams are crossing at the target point. Still need confirmation tho.

I really look forward to the taric update, I think he'll see a lot more play botlane and with the subtle way that his w it does kinda keep him there or somehow relying on ganks and pulling off some weird combo. He seems strong, but not too strong focusing less on damage and more on utility and play making.....as a support should haha
Exactly, I expect Kalista +Taric being a really strong and fun lane with the ability to save each other, and set each other up for plays.
So what does Taric do with his right-hand WITHOUT the shield?
Uses his magic brah. Space magic. The worst kind of magic. Fucking space wizards and their martial prowess. {{champion:89}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:131}}
His W and R combo is broken af...nerfs inc.

> [{quoted}](name=Slidmaster,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Oh7aw6Bd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-05T19:48:10.844+0000)
>
> His W and R combo is broken af...nerfs inc.

Depends on the teammates Taric has. 

The delay is rather long as well.
His Ult has a 2.5 second delay
Watch the videos. His E and R are both VERY telegraphed. It's not like he's going to bust out with the insta-cast BS Kayle ult, you will SEE that shit coming well in time to turn tail and run for it.

Yes, it means exactly that. 
His Ultimate is also duplicated
